1100110001000010 0010111110001001 0 -> sum: 1111101111001011, cout: 0

1000000101101101 0110010011110111 1 -> sum: 1110011001100101, cout: 0
1111000100101001 0001110111010101 0 -> sum: 0000111011111110, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
